concept.title: Privacy and Personal Data Collection Disclosure

conbody.p: Certain features available in company_name products collect and send feedback regarding product usage and detection information to company_name. Some of this data is considered personal in certain jurisdictions and under certain regulations. If you do not want company_name to collect personal data, you must ensure that you disable the related features.
The following link outlines the types of data that company_name collect and provides detailed instructions on how to disable the specific features that feedback the information.
Data collected by company_name is subject to the conditions stated in the company_name Privacy Notice:
